description: Try our easy to follow Bruschetta with Avocado, Hummus & Zucchini recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Bruschetta with Avocado, Hummus & Zucchini Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 medium zucchinis, thinly sliced lengthways with a mandolin or vegetable peeler
1 Woolworths sourdough loaf, cut into 1.5cmthick slices

recipeInstructions.text: Combine zucchini slices and 1 tablespoon of the olive oil on a large tray, toss to coat. Season.
Cook zucchini on a preheated grill pan over high heat for 1 minute, turning or until softened. Transfer to a baking paperlined tray.
Process chickpeas, tahini, lemon juice and remaining 100mls oil in a food processor until smooth. Add avocado and process until combined. Season. Makes about 21/4 cups.

Spray each side of the bread with olive oil. Toast the bread on preheated chargrill pan on each side until toasted, spread with avocado hummus and top with zucchini. Tip 1: Avocado hummus is great served with sliced vegetables as a dip. Tip 2: Spread the avocado hummus over wraps for school lunch boxes. Tip 3: Avocado hummus is best eaten within 1 day of making, store, covered closely with plastic wrap in a jar in the fridge.
